name: Blessing of Liberty
components: V, S, M (a feather or small object that symbolizes good fortune)
text: You imbue yourself with the blessings of liberty. You gain a +1 luck bonus per 6 caster levels (minimum +1, maximum +3) to your CMD and on saving throws against spells and traps that would move you or impede your movement. You can end the spell’s effects as a swift action to gain a +20 foot enhancement bonus to your base speed for 1 round per whole minute of duration remaining.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (象征幸运的一根羽毛或一件小物品)
text_zh: 你的胸臆充塞著自由万岁的祝福。你在你的CMD，以及对抗会移动你或阻碍你行动的法术与陷阱的豁免检定上，获得每6个施法者等级+1的幸运加值(最小+1，最大+3)。你能以一个迅捷动作结束此法术的效果，在你的基础速度上获得20尺速度的增强加值，此时间为本法术剩余之持续时间，每一个完整的一分钟/1轮。
